sentences.en: Few buildings survived the war intact.
sentences.cn: 战争之后没几座完好的建筑了。

sentences.en: Most of the house remains intact even after two hundred years.
sentences.cn: 虽然过了两百年，这房子的大部分还保持完好。

sentences.en: Natural resources should be handed on to the next generation intact.
sentences.cn: 自然资源应该完好无损地传给下一代。
